posts.description: Is Python interpreted or compiled? Are CPython and Cython the same thing? And what on Earth is PyPy? Understand the alphabet of Pythons, from start to finish.

[Qatar Opportunity]
We have requirement for a Microsoft BI Resource having 5+ years of experience for one of our customers at QATAR. The duration of the engagement will be initially 3 months, extendable.

The ideal candidate should be motivated by diverse responsibilities including software development, reinsurance application maintenance, vendor management and operational support, etc. He/she should not be averse to writing user requirements and technical documentations. The person should be user service oriented, and comfortable liaising with users and vendors. 
 
Required Skills
-          Familiar with concepts of data modelling in both relational and dimensional
-          'Feel at home' when it comes to databases, And very comfortable with complex SQL statements, stored procedures and functions.
-          Experienced with BI tools, preferable Microsoft BI Suite, i.e. SSIS, SSRS and SSAS
-          Proficient with application development skills such as C#, Java, etc.
Nice to have
-          Multi-dimensional data market development experiences (MDX)
-          Experiences with In-memory BI Tools e.g. PowerPivot, Qlikview, etc.
-          SharePoint skills a big plus.

If you are interested then please send your cv to 
"jobs@itpharaohs.com" with subject "BI-Q-OP-105"
